import React, { FunctionComponent, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, RouteComponentProps } from 'react-router-dom'; import User from '../models/user'; import voiduser from '../models/void-user'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; import getCurrent from '../api-request/user/get-current'; interface Props extends RouteComponentProps<{ id: string }> { } const UserSettings: FunctionComponent = ({ match }) => { const [EditPseudo, setEditPseudo] = useState(true); const [EditMail, setEditMail] = useState(true); const [EditPassWord, setEditPassWord] = useState(true); const [EditDelete, setEditDelete] = useState(true); const [user, setUser] = useState(voiduser); useEffect(() => { const token = Cookies.get('token') getCurrent(token).then(result => { setUser(result[0]) }) }, [match.params.id]) return (
Back to Profile
{EditPseudo ? (

Pseudo : { setEditPseudo(false); setEditMail(true); setEditPassWord(true) }}>edit

{user.pseudo}

) : (

New pseudo : setEditPseudo(true)}>close

Save
)}
{EditMail ? (

Email : { setEditPseudo(true); setEditMail(false); setEditPassWord(true) }}>edit

{user.email}

) : (

New email : setEditMail(true)}>close

Save
)}
{EditPassWord ? (

Password : { setEditPseudo(true); setEditMail(true); setEditPassWord(false); setEditDelete(true) }}>edit

************

) : (

New password : setEditPassWord(true)}>close

Confirm new password :

Save
)}
{EditDelete ? (

Password : { setEditPseudo(true); setEditMail(true); setEditPassWord(true); setEditDelete(false) }}>delete

) : (

Password : {setEditDelete(true) }}>delete

Save
)}
); } export default UserSettings;
